All Them Witches - Nothing as the Ideal - Amazon.com Music
s: Esse e sem dúvida um dos melhores álbuns da banda ALL THEM WITCHES. ... So nice that ATW don't stick to a formula. Each album seems to be a musical reorientation of sorts. There's teasing humour and drama, wrapped up in superb sounds. Excellent musicians - hope they don't get too famous too soon. This is another excellent album. Probably subjected to the best production so far. This feels like more of a rock album than their previous releases. Great depth of sound. My copy of the vinyl ...
